summary: Changes the Transmute-Spell in order to transmute iron ore to silver first.
descriptionHtml:
One thing that is annoying me with the transmute spell is simply this:

"Transmuting iron ore to silver ore, but not gold, may be preferable due to the higher availability of gems used in silver jewelry. This requires emptying the inventory of silver ore between each cast."
- http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Transmute_Mineral_Ore

So what this mod does, it first transmutes all iron ore in the inventory to silver ore and then transmutes the silver ore to gold.
However, you can transmute your iron ore to gold by dual casting the spell.
If you got no iron ore in your inventory but more than 2 silver ores, dual casting the spell will transmute 2 silver ores to 2 gold.
That's it, easy as eating pancakes :)


[u]Optional files:[/u]

[b]- Silver Edition -[/b]
With the “Silver Edition” you can only transmute to gold by dual casting the spell.
This is only a script change so no additional plug-ins.
[i]Special thanks to JamieSM97 for thisidea.[/i]

[b]- You Got The Skills -[/b]
Now when dual casting the spell you transmute more ores at a time depending on your alteration skills.
This is only a script change so no additional plug-ins.

[i]Skill Level     iron to gold     silver to gold
    <45                  1                    2
     45[i]                   [/i]1[i][i]                    [/i][/i]3
     50[i]                   2[i][i]                   [/i][/i] [/i]4
     55[i][i]                   [/i][/i]2[i][i]                    [/i][/i]5
     60[i][i]                   [/i][/i]3[i][i]                    [/i][/i]6
     65[i][i]                   [/i][/i]3[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]7
     70[i][i]                   [/i][/i]4[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]8
     75[i][i]                   [/i][/i]4[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]9
     80[i][i]                   [/i][/i]5[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]10
     85[i][i]                   [/i][/i]5[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]11
     90[i][i]                   [/i][/i]6[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]12
     95[i][i]                   [/i][/i]6[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]13
   100[i][i]                   [/i][/i]7[i][i][i]                    [/i][/i][/i]14
[/i]


Any suggestions (as well to the description) are more than welcome :)
author: wiktorio
